landing_title:
Turn any idea into a
perfect actionable itinerary
landing_desc: Say goodbye to tedious comparisons. We integrate real-time flight and hotel data with top-tier AI to plan the most optimal routes. Generate instantly, edit anytime, export in one click.
landing_bonus: No credit card required â€¢ Get 6 free credits on signup
how_desc: Transform your travel inspiration into a precise, structured itinerary in just three simple steps.
step1_desc: Launch your personal studio and input your origin, destination, and dates through a structured panel to ensure data accuracy.
step2_desc: Our AI synchronously requests real-time prices from multiple travel providers to find the best options that fit your budget.
step3_desc: Get a professional tracklist itinerary in seconds. Make local adjustments and export to Google Maps with one click.
faq_q1: What is the HKfirstclick AI itinerary tool?
faq_a1: It allows you to input any destination and dates, converting them into an actionable itinerary using AI and real-time API data.
faq_a2: Our system analyzes your needs using advanced LLMs and fetches live quotes from travel providers to ensure realistic and budget-friendly routes.
faq_q3: Can I modify the generated itinerary?
faq_a3: Absolutely. The system supports conversational and manual tweaks. When you adjust the plan, AI recalculates flights and hotels automatically.
faq_a4: All flight and hotel prices are sourced from partner APIs in real-time. No AI hallucinations. However, prices fluctuate, so final booking pages apply.
faq_a5: Pro Members enjoy unlimited PDF and Google Maps exports. Casual users spend 1 Credit per export.
ws_desc: Fill in the basics, and AI will fetch real-time data to generate a professional structured list.
pref_desc: Tell us your travel preferences and budget, and we will generate a pro-level exclusive itinerary for you.
q3_title: 3. What is your total estimated budget?
q4_ph: e.g.: Traveling with elders, need wheelchair accessible hotels...
gen_desc: Matching suitable flights and accommodations based on your preferences and budget.
err_empty: Please fill in all required fields
err_date: Return date cannot be earlier than departure
cat_desc: Discover perfect itineraries successfully generated by our AI for other travelers.
price_desc: Including validity terms. Choose the best credit plan for your trips.
tier1_desc: Experience AI magic risk-free. Get structured inspiration for your first trip.
tier2_desc: Designed for a single perfect vacation. Unlock advanced AI to say goodbye to anxiety.
tier3_desc: For frequent travelers. Your 24/7 exclusive AI consultant with top-tier privileges.
tier4_desc: Flexible top-up to keep your travel inspiration flowing. Pay as you go.
rule_2_p1_v: Covers a full planning cycle, giving you ample time to carefully craft and perfect your vacation.
rule_2_p2_v: An extended 365-day validity ensures you always have backup credits for last-minute tweaks.
rule_2_p3_v: Designed for true explorers. 365 days of uninterrupted inspiration, ready for departure whenever you are.
login_desc: Sync all your itineraries and preferences.
map_desc: Visualize your trajectory. This feature is currently in preview for Pro Members only.
